items.sentence: You were nodding off at times during my lecture.
You should get your eyes examined by the doctor.
I suspect that Tom will be reluctant to do that.
I'll wait for you in front of the radio station.
When did you manage to find the time to do that?
Tom went to the kitchen to get something to eat.
This towel is so soft and fluffy. It feels good!
I'd like you to translate this book into French.
One out of three people in this city owns a car.
A man as diligent as Tom is, is sure to succeed.
